effects: Increase the limit burst gauge fill rate by 100%
Increase SPR by 50% when equipped with a Staff
Increase SPR by 50% when equipped with a Bow
name: White Lotus

desc_short.0: Boost fill rate of burst stones and boost SPR when equipped with a staff or bow
desc_short.5: Las piedras de estallido recuperan más EL y aumenta el ESP al llevar bastón o arco
